conbody.p: HTTPSconfiguring for cluster pipelinescluster pipelinesconfiguring HTTPSTo configure HTTPS when you run cluster pipelines, you can use a self-signed certificate. Or, you can generate an SSL/TLS certificate for the gateway node and the worker nodes. You specify the generated keystore file and keystore password file for the gateway and worker nodes in the configuration file, sdc.properties. You can optionally generate a truststore file for the gateway and worker nodes.
conbody.note: If you run both standalone and cluster pipelines, configure HTTPS for cluster pipelines.
